title: Pierce Brosnan says he's heard his Black Adam character is "going to have his own show, or his own movie" and is "going to be in the next Superman"
summary: Pierce Brosnan, who previously starred in DCEU's Black Adam, is rumored to be making a return to comic book movies despite recent changes in the DCEU leadership.

title: Betty Gilpin Joins Ron Howard’s Amazon MGM Military Drama ‘Alone At Dawn’
summary: Betty Gilpin has joined Adam Driver and Anne Hathaway in Ron Howard's upcoming Amazon MGM military drama, "Alone at Dawn," which is based on a 2019 book.

title: Financial Firm GFI Group Expands to 129K SF at 55 Water Street
summary: A financial services firm, GFI Group, is significantly expanding its footprint in Manhattan's Financial District, doubling its office space to a total of 128,749 square feet.

title: Yankees Predicted To Land Superstar Slugger With $360 Million Blockbuster
summary: Yankees principal owner Hal Steinbrenner held a press conference at Yankee Stadium in Bronx, New York, on December 21, 2022.

title: Malayalam’s first action hero did over 100 films in 6 years; died performing dangerous stunt hanging from a helicopter
summary: Malayalam cinema has historically been deeply intertwined with the socio-political fabric and realities of Kerala society, primarily focusing on depicting stories and lives of common people.

title: Warren Beatty and Carrie Fisher, Then 17, Take a Break During Filming of the Movie “Shampoo” (1975)
summary: The article introduces "Shampoo," a 1975 American comedy film directed by Hal Ashby. It lists the starring cast including Warren Beatty, Julie Christie, Goldie Hawn, Lee Grant, Jack Warden, Tony Bill, and Carrie Fisher, and notes that the film was co-written by Beatty.

title: Here’s Why Aristotle Atlantic’s Core Equity Strategy Sold Halliburton Company (HAL)
summary: Aristotle Atlantic Partners, an investment advisor, released its Core Equity Strategy third-quarter 2025 investor letter, which detailed market review and quarterly performance.

title: Paras Defence wins ₹71.68 cr DRDO order for submarine optronic periscopes
summary: Paras Defence and Space Technologies Ltd. has secured a ₹71.68 crore order from the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) for the supply of two Optronic Periscopes.

title: Here’s Why Aristotle Atlantic’s Core Equity Strategy Sold Halliburton Company (HAL)
summary: Aristotle Atlantic Partners, an investment advisor, released its third-quarter 2025 investor letter, providing a market review and detailing the quarterly performance of its Core Equity Strategy.

title: How India’s experience reflects on women’s evolving role in peacekeeping
summary: The Indian Army is planning to induct women soldiers into its Territorial Army (TA) battalions, a significant move to expand opportunities for women within the armed forces.

title: India-UK military exercise 'Ajeya Warrior-25' begins in Rajasthan
summary: The eighth edition of the India-UK joint military exercise 'Ajeya Warrior-25' commenced at the Mahajan field firing ranges in Bikaner, Rajasthan, on Monday, conducted under a United Nations mandate.
